languages.text: "Признаться, я беспокоюсь за душевное состояние Леди-Навигатора. Она замкнута в себе и совершенно не ладит с командой, отчего ее все сторонятся — даже старшие офицеры бывают суеверны. Боюсь, только вы способны поговорить с ней на равных и смягчить ситуацию. Ради безопасности экипажа и самой леди Кассии".

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, я беспокоюсь за душевное состояние Леди-Навигатора. Она замкнута в себе и совершенно не ладит с командой, от чего ее все сторонятся — солдаты суеверны, сами знаете. Боюсь, только вы способны поговорить с ней на равных и смягчить ситуацию. Ради безопасности экипажа и самой леди Кассии".

languages.text: "If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, я беспокоюсь за душевное состояние Леди-Навигатора. Она замкнута в себе и совершенно не ладит с командой, отчего ее все сторонятся — даже старшие офицеры бывают суеверны. Боюсь, только вы способны поговорить с ней на равных и смягчить ситуацию. Ради безопасности экипажа и самой леди Кассии".

traits.locale_text: "To be honest, I'm worried about the Lady Navigator's state of mind. She is self-contained and does not get along with the team at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I'm afraid only you are able to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the safety of the crew and Lady Cassia herself."

"To be honest, I'm worried about the Lady Navigator's state of mind. She is self-contained and does not get along with the team at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I'm afraid only you are able to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the safety of the crew and Lady Cassia herself."

"If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

"If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

"If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

languages.text: “如果您允许我发言的话，舰长大人，导航者女士的精神状况令我感到担忧。她沉默寡言，从不和别的船员交流，因此所有人都躲着她。毕竟，就算是高阶军官，也可能会有迷信的想法。恐怕只有您能站在平等的立场上与她谈谈，改善目前的状况。这么做既是为了船员们的安全，也是为了卡西娅女士本人。”
languages.original_text: "If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

traits.locale_text: “如果您允许我发言的话，舰长大人，导航者女士的精神状况令我感到担忧。她沉默寡言，从不和别的船员交流，因此所有人都躲着她。毕竟，就算是高阶军官，也可能会有迷信的想法。恐怕只有您能站在平等的立场上与她谈谈，改善目前的状况。这么做既是为了船员们的安全，也是为了卡西娅女士本人。”

languages.text: «Si me lo permite, Lord Capitán, el estado mental de la lady Navegante me preocupa. Se aísla y no congenia en absoluto con la tripulación, lo que hace que todo el mundo la evite; incluso los oficiales veteranos pueden caer en la superstición. Me temo que solo usted está en posición de hablar con ella como un{mf||a} igual y cambiar esta situación, por la seguridad de la tripulación y de la propia Cassia».
languages.original_text: "If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

traits.locale_text: «Si me lo permite, Lord Capitán, el estado mental de la lady Navegante me preocupa. Se aísla y no congenia en absoluto con la tripulación, lo que hace que todo el mundo la evite; incluso los oficiales veteranos pueden caer en la superstición. Me temo que solo usted está en posición de hablar con ella como un{mf||a} igual y cambiar esta situación, por la seguridad de la tripulación y de la propia Cassia».

languages.text: "Falls Ihr gestattet, Lord Captain ... der Geisteszustand der Lady Navigatorin bereitet mir Sorge. Sie ist verschlossen und pflegt keinerlei Kontakte mit der Crew, weshalb sie alle meiden ... selbst erfahrene Offiziere können abergläubisch sein. Ich fürchte, dass nur Ihr in der Position seid, auf Augenhöhe mit ihr zu sprechen, um die Situation zu verbessern. Für die Sicherheit der Crew ... und die Sicherheit von Lady Cassia selbst."
languages.original_text: "If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr gestattet, Lord Captain ... der Geisteszustand der Lady Navigatorin bereitet mir Sorge. Sie ist verschlossen und pflegt keinerlei Kontakte mit der Crew, weshalb sie alle meiden ... selbst erfahrene Offiziere können abergläubisch sein. Ich fürchte, dass nur Ihr in der Position seid, auf Augenhöhe mit ihr zu sprechen, um die Situation zu verbessern. Für die Sicherheit der Crew ... und die Sicherheit von Lady Cassia selbst."

languages.text: « Si je puis me permettre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, l'état d'esprit de la navigatrice me préoccupe. Elle est renfermée sur elle-même et ne se mélange pas avec l'équipage, ce qui fait que tout le monde l'évite... même les officiers supérieurs peuvent être superstitieux, vous savez. Je crains que vous soyez la seule personne à pouvoir lui parler sur un pied d'égalité pour améliorer la situation. Il en va de la sécurité de l'équipage... et de dame Cassia elle-même. »
languages.original_text: "If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

traits.locale_text: « Si je puis me permettre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, l'état d'esprit de la navigatrice me préoccupe. Elle est renfermée sur elle-même et ne se mélange pas avec l'équipage, ce qui fait que tout le monde l'évite... même les officiers supérieurs peuvent être superstitieux, vous savez. Je crains que vous soyez la seule personne à pouvoir lui parler sur un pied d'égalité pour améliorer la situation. Il en va de la sécurité de l'équipage... et de dame Cassia elle-même. »

languages.text: 「すみませんが、ロード・キャプテン…レディ航宙士の精神状態が心配です。彼女は自己完結型で、クルー達とまったく話が噛み合わず、皆が彼女を避けています。上級士官ですら思い込んで行動するほどです。あなただけが彼女と対等な立場で話して、状況を良い方向へ運べるのではないでしょうか。クルーの安心、そしてカシア様の心の安らぎのために」
languages.original_text: "If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."

traits.locale_text: 「すみませんが、ロード・キャプテン…レディ航宙士の精神状態が心配です。彼女は自己完結型で、クルー達とまったく話が噛み合わず、皆が彼女を避けています。上級士官ですら思い込んで行動するほどです。あなただけが彼女と対等な立場で話して、状況を良い方向へ運べるのではないでしょうか。クルーの安心、そしてカシア様の心の安らぎのために」

languages.text: "İzninizle ekleyeyim Lord Kaptan: Leydi Rotacı'nın akıl sağlığı beni endişelendiriyor. İçine kapanık birisi, mürettebatla hiç kaynaşamıyor. Bu yüzden herkes ondan kaçınıyor. Kıdemli subaylar bile hurafelere inanır oldu. Kendisiyle hemzemin bir konumda olduğunuz için onunla konuşup durumu değiştirmek korkarım size düşüyor. İşin ucunda mürettebatın ve Leydi Cassia'nın güvenliği var."
languages.original_text: "If I may, Lord Captain — the Lady Navigator's state of mind worries me. She is self-contained and does not mesh with the crew at all, which is why everyone avoids her — even senior officers can be superstitious. I fear that only you are in a position to talk to her on an equal footing and improve the situation. For the sake of the crew's safety — and that of Lady Cassia herself."
